Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht exploded for 35 points, helping LA secure the 128-122 win in overtime.
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James was absent for the game.
Anthony Davis was expected to be instrumental in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis was named to the NBA All-Defensive First Team, marking his fifth selection to an all-defensive team in his 12-year career.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game began with a fast pace, as the Lakers edged out the Suns 35-30 in the first quarter.
The Suns outscored LA by 10 in the second period for a 67-62 lead at halftime.
Anthony Davis finished with 35 points, surpassing his previous best of 24 in this yearâ€™s preseason.
Lakers head coach JJ Redick shared that the team intends to fully utilize Anthony Davis on both offense and defense.
